p: To determine the tissue expression levels of m NOD1 and m NOD2, RT-PCR was performed. mRNA expression of m NOD1 and m NOD2 was detected in all seven tissues collected. We found that m NOD1 and m NOD2 mRNAs were highly expressed in heart, spleen, gill, and head kidney, particularly in head kidney and gill, and the expression of m NOD2 was generally higher than that of m NOD1 in these four tissues. On the other hand, relatively low expression of m NOD1 and m NOD2 was detected in the liver, muscle, and intestine (Fig.Â 3a and b).
